author: Jardel Barros
title: Sponsorship for Brazilian youtuber
description: A large part of the Brazilian population does not know what blockchain, crypto and cardano are.
solution: Lack of knowledge is resolved with quality information and easy language. I will produce content weekly to clarify the Brazilians
experience: Arouse the interest and curiosity of the Brazilian people to get to know the cardano project, participating in the community and investing
